#include<iostream>
#include<cstring>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int t,total,a[4],sol[40005],j,i;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        memset(a,0,sizeof(a));
        memset(sol,0,sizeof(sol));
        cin>>total>>a[0]>>a[1]>>a[2]>>a[3];
        sol[0]=1;
        for(i=0;i<4;i++)
        {
            for(j=total;j>=0;j--)
            {
                if(sol[j]==1)
                {
                    sol[j+a[i]]=1;
                }
            }
        }
        if(sol[total]==1)
            cout<<"YES"<<endl;
        else
            cout<<"NO"<<endl;
    }
}
